titleStmt.title: The season for Englands selfe-reflection and advancing temple-vvork discovered in a sermon preached to the two Houses of Parliament at Margarets Westminster, Aug. 13, 1644, being an extraordinary day of humiliation / by Thomas Hill ...
titleStmt.author: Hill, Thomas, d. 1653.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Richard Cotes for John Bellamy and Philemon Stephens,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
